attributes.action: We demand a Commons vote of no-confidence in HM Government
attributes.additional_details:
Following the welfare reforms of 1st April 2013, we the undersigned demand that a vote of no-confidence in the Coalition government is forced in the House of Commons.

This government has lost sight of the plight of the majority of the population, ie, the so-called 'bedroom tax, while seeming to protect the interests of the rich.
